text: The 2019 Men's African Volleyball Championship was held in Tunis, Tunisia, from 21 to 28 July 2019. ==Qualification== 10 teams have registered to participate in the 2019 Men's African Nations {| class="wikitable" style="width:300;" |- !width=50%|Means of qualification !width=50%|Qualifier |- |Host Country|| |- |rowspan="3"|FIVB ranking || |- || |- | |- |Zone 1|| |- |rowspan="3"|Zone 4|| |- | |- | |- |Zone 5|| |- |Zone 6|| |- |} ==Squads== ==Venues== * El Menzah Sports Palace, Tunis, Tunisia {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" align=center ! Tunis |rowspan=4| |- |width=150px|El Menzah Sports Palace |- | Capacity: 6,000 |- | 210px |} ==Format== ===Pool standing procedure=== # Number of matches won # Match points # Sets ratio # Points ratio # Result of the last match between the tied teams Match won 3–0 or 3–1: 3 match points for the winner, 0 match points for the loser Match won 3–2: 2 match points for the winner, 1 match point for the loser. ==Pool Composition== The draw was held in Tunis, Tunisia on 20 July 2019. {| class="wikitable" width=600 |- !width=25%|Pool A !width=25%|Pool B |- | (Hosts) | |- | | |- | | |- | | |- | | |} ==Preliminary round== *All times are West Africa Time (UTC+01:00). {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#dfefff| ||Qualified for the 5th–8th semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ffffcc| ||Qualified for the 9th place match |} ===Pool A=== |} |} ===Pool B=== |} |} ==Final round== ===9th place match=== |} ===5th–8th semifinals=== |} ===Semifinals=== |} ===7th place match=== |} ===5th place match=== |} ===3rd place match=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | || style="text-align:left;"| |- | || style="text- align:left;"| |- | || style="text-align:left;"| |- | 4 || style="text- align:left;"| |- | 5 || style="text-align:left;"| |- | 6 || style="text- align:left;"| |- | 7 || style="text-align:left;"| |- | 8 || style="text- align:left;"| |- | 9 || style="text-align:left;"| |- | 10 || style="text- align:left;"| |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2020 Challenger Cup |} {| style="text- align:center; margin-top:2em; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto" |- |Team Roster |- |Aymen Redissi, Mohamed Ali Ben Othmen Miladi, Elyes Karamosli, Hamza Nagga, Ismaïl Moalla, Khaled Ben Slimene, Chokri Jouini, Saddem Hmissi, Hosni Karamosly, Aymen Karoui, Salim Mbarki, Haykel Jerbi, Mohamed Ayech, Ali Bongui |- |Head Coach |- |Antonio Giacobbe |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Hamza Nagga *Best Spiker : Yvan Arthur Kody Bitjaa *Best Blocker : Salim Mbarki *Best Server : Didier Sali Hilé *Best Setter : Ahmed Awal Mbutngam *Best Receiver : Ismaïl Moalla *Best Libero : Elyes Achour ==See also== *2019 Women's African Volleyball Championship ==References== ==External links== *Official website 2019 Men African Men's Volleyball Championship Men's African Volleyball Championship Category:2019 in Tunisian sport Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Tunisia Category:Sports competitions in Tunis Men's African Volleyball Championship
